page.title: 01GENERAL SUMMARY.
page.content: Our area of Glengormley and Mallusk on the outskirts of Belfast is quite varied in character. Approximately 25% of the area is heavily populated, whereas about 50% of the area is taken up by farmland. The last 25% of the area is taken up by industrial estates and commercial propeties. There are also several large playing fields. At the centre of the Glengormley area the meeting of the Antrim Road, Ballyclare Road and Hightown Road form the shopping and commercial centre of the area, with many various facilities serving the residential area. The M2 running between Belfast and the West cuts our area with a large intersection just to the North of Glengormley. This has helped the development of the residential and industrial area. The area is relatively wealthy and prosperous.{
